column3: Latest; Preah Sihanouk: Cambodia has the first discovered case of the coronavirus in a Chinese person in Sihanoukville
column4: Health Minister Mam Bunheng told a press conference.------UPDATE: ------Search is on for the passengers on board------ the same flight from Wuhan-SHK.------PHNOM PENH – The Ministry of Health has discovered a new case of respiratory disease caused by the coronavirus
column5: from a Chinese man who entered Cambodia
column6: according to Minister of Health Mam Bunheng during a press conference on the evening of January 27
column7: 2020.------The minister said that as of 3 pm on January 27
column8: the ministry had searched and confirmed with Pasteur Institute of Cambodia that the man was positive for new strain of the virus (2019-nCoV).  Jia Jianhua 60 years old
column9: was traveling from Wuhan with his family of 4:------1. Jia Jianhua
column11: male------2. Wang Ling Wang Jen (Lingzhen) 57-year-old female ------3. Xiao Yan
column16: he and his family left  for Sihanoukville on January 23
column17: and he had symptoms of fever on Jan 25
column18: 2020.------They arrived from the People’s Republic of China on a  direct flight from the city of Wuhan.------They arrived at Preah Sihanouk International Airport on January 23
column19: 2020 at 7:00 pm. After arriving in Sihanoukville
column20: they took a taxi ride to the Independence Hotel. Then he went to play cards at the Queenco Hotel on the afternoon of January 25th .------That afternoon
column21: Jiang Hour played in the casino for two hours.------Coming down with a fever
column24: phoned his family in China and told them that her husband was sick. She received information to call authorities.------On January 26 provincial authorities
column25: together with the Chairman of the Department of Health were alerted.------He is currently in Preah Sihanouk province under treatment.------More to follow------ទូរទស្សន៍ព័ត៌មាន Fresh News ផ្សាយផ្ទាល់៖ ក្រសួងសុខាភិបាលធ្វើសន្និសីទសារព័ត៌មាន ពាក់ព័ន្ធមេរោគផ្លូវដង្ហើមប្រភេទថ្មី កូរ៉ូណា ដែលកំពុងរីករាលដាលតាមបណ្តាប្រទេសជុំវិញពិភពលោក
